mapper.sql: id, name, description, kb_id, creator_id, status, deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.name, t.description, t.kb_id, t.creator_id, u.nickname as creator_name, t.status, t.create_time, t.update_time, kb.name as kb_name FROM kb_tag t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.creator_id = u.id LEFT JOIN kb_knowledge_base kb ON t.kb_id = kb.id WHERE t.id = #{id} AND t.deleted = 0

SELECT t.id, t.name, t.description, t.kb_id, t.creator_id, u.nickname as creator_name, t.status, t.create_time, t.update_time, kb.name as kb_name FROM kb_tag t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.creator_id = u.id LEFT JOIN kb_knowledge_base kb ON t.kb_id = kb.id WHERE t.kb_id = #{kbId} AND t.deleted = 0 AND t.status = 1 ORDER BY t.create_time DESC

SELECT t.id, t.name, t.description, t.kb_id, t.creator_id, u.nickname as creator_name, t.status, t.create_time, t.update_time, kb.name as kb_name FROM kb_tag t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.creator_id = u.id LEFT JOIN kb_knowledge_base kb ON t.kb_id = kb.id INNER JOIN kb_document_tag dt ON t.id = dt.tag_id WHERE dt.document_id = #{documentId} AND t.deleted = 0 AND t.status = 1 ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
